DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety GW685698X 100mcg daily either morning evening GW685698X 250mcg administer daily even via DISKHALER 28 day subject persistent bronchial asthma .
DOC.brief_title: A Study GW685698X 100mcg Administered Once Daily Either Morning Evening GW685698X 250mcg Administered Once Daily Evening Via DISKHALER 28 Days Subjects With Persistent Bronchial Asthma .
DOC.criteria: Outpatients age 16 65 year . Male female ; female subject must nonchild bear potential childbearing potenetial negative pregnancy test willing use acceptable contraceptive method Documented clinical history persistent asthma first diagnose least 6 month prior Visit 1 Currently receive inhale shortacting beta2 agonist symptom relief A lung function 50 90 % predict ( PEF ) Increase PEF least15 % , 20 minute inhalation 400mcg salbutamol History respiratory tract infection and/or exacerbation asthma within period 4 week prior Visit 1 History lifethreatening asthma , define asthma episode require intubation and/or associate hypercapnoea , respiratory arrest hypoxia seizure . A history two asthma exacerbation require treatment oral corticosteroid hospitalisation 6 month Visit 1 . Past present disease , judge investigator , may affect outcome study . These disease include , limited , cardiovascular disease , malignancy , hepatic disease , renal disease , haematologic disease , neurological disease , endocrine disease pulmonary disease ( include , confine , chronic bronchitis , emphysema , bronchiectasis need treatment , cystic fibrosis bronchopulmonary dysplasia ) . Known suspected sensitivity corticosteroid , VENTOLIN , constituent ROTADISKS ( e.g. , lactose ) . Undergoing allergen desensitisation therapy . Neurological psychiatric disease history drug alcohol abuse would interfere subject 's proper completion protocol requirement . Is current smoker smoke history 10 pack year ( e.g. , 20 cigarettes/day 10 year ) . Note : Current smoker define currently smoke stop smoke within 6 month screen visit .
